name: Donald WOLFORD, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Wolford v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: Donald WOLFORD, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellee.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The petition for allowance of appeal having been improvidently granted, the appeal is dismissed, 35 Pa.Cmwlth. 43, 384 A.2d 1035.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John S. Alexander, Louis M. Shucker, Reading, for appellant.
Daniel R. Schuckers, Gary J. Marini, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
414 A.2d 129
Donald WOLFORD, Appellant, v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 17, 1980.
Decided May 16, 1980.
John S. Alexander, Louis M. Shucker, Reading, for appellant.
Daniel R. Schuckers, Gary J. Marini, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
